meanings.definition: A sore on the skin or mucous membrane
meanings.sent1: The doctor treated the ulcers on the patient's leg.
meanings.sent2: She had to apply ointment to the ulcers to help them heal.
meanings.sent3: The ulcers on the sidewalk seemed to be talking to each other.
meanings.sent4: The city's neglect of the park was like an ulcer eating away at its beauty.
meanings.sent5: The image of the ulcers haunted her dreams.

meanings.definition: A break in the skin or mucous membrane with loss of surface tissue
meanings.sent1: His foot ulcers made it painful to walk.
meanings.sent2: The nurse cleaned the ulcers carefully to prevent infection.
meanings.sent3: The ulcers in the road seemed to be on vacation.
meanings.sent4: The division in the team was like an ulcer in their unity.
meanings.sent5: The smell from the ulcers filled the room with a sickly scent.

meanings.definition: A lesion on the surface of the skin or a mucous surface, resulting from the sloughing of necrotic inflammatory tissue
meanings.sent1: The ulcers on his arm were a result of the infection.
meanings.sent2: She winced as the doctor examined the painful ulcers.
meanings.sent3: The ulcers on the tree bark seemed to be gossiping.
meanings.sent4: The corruption in the government was like an ulcer eating away at society.
meanings.sent5: The sight of the ulcers made her stomach turn.
